title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Language Learning Material Analysis Training Through Gaze Modeling

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental language teaching methods and digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can identify core elements of language learning materials with 80% accuracy using the EMME (Eye Movement Modeling Example) technique.
Learners can reduce key information search time in new language materials by 30% by referencing models.
Learners can write analysis reports utilizing eye-tracking data in project-based assessment tasks.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
